name: obscurum (MikeGaming911, Eshego)
description:
obscurum [ɔpˈskuː.rum] : shadowy, obscured, darkness.

find a way out, the light will guide you.

controls:

WASD to move, R to respawn, Alt + F4 to close game, MB1 or Space for dialogue skip

gameplay:

gameplay is very simple, collect gems and illuminate the way to your end.

game design: michael quecano

graphics: johnathan jackson

programming: michael mouro
